infotexts.entitydescription.bothseawayround: A 50 cal cartridge powder. It smells like squares.
infotexts.entitydescription.seawaymagazine: A mechanic fashioned this from two 50 cal rounds, meant to be used with a Bangstick.
infotexts.entitydescription.waternugget: It's wet, the rim says USSR
infotexts.entitydescription.airnugget: It's dry, the rim says USSR
infotexts.entitydescription.water3006: It's wet, the tip is black, and the rim says Winchester
infotexts.entitydescription.air3006: It's dry, the tip is black, and the rim says Winchester
infotexts.entitydescription.nuggetmagazine: A mechanic fashioned this from empty plastic french fries container to hold 5 rounds of 7.62 by 52mm rim fired ammo, it's extra greasy.
infotexts.entitydescription.mosinmagazine: A weapons expert crafted this from steel to hold 5 rounds of 7.62 by 52mm rim fired ammo.
infotexts.entitydescription.m1amagazine: A weapons expert crafted this from steel to hold 8 rounds of 30-06 rim fired ammo. It pings
infotexts.entitydescription.tacomagazine: A mechanic expert crafted this from plastic to hold 8 rounds of 30-06 rim fired ammo. It doesn't ping and smells like churros.
infotexts.entitydescription.m1agarand: An old design made by a mechanic, served in a lot of land wars but doesn't function well in water.
infotexts.entitydescription.m1agarand_f: An eletrician taped a flashlight on this gun.
infotexts.entitydescription.m1agarandtanker: An old design made by a mechanic, shortened by 7 inches, served in a lot of land wars but doesn't function well in water.
infotexts.entitydescription.m1agarandtanker_f: An eletrician taped a flashlight on this gun.
infotexts.entitydescription.nugget_f: An electrician crafted this to hold a functioning light while shooting the gun.
infotexts.entitydescription.nugget: An old design made by a mechanic, served in a lot of land wars but doesn't function well in water.
infotexts.entitydescription.nugget_fmm: Flashlight and knife, but its main weapon is the buttstock for bludgeoning people with high libido. Barrel plugged and coated with Elastin to avoid water damage.
infotexts.entitydescription.nugget_m: Knife is in the shooting end and now it can't shoot no more. Barrel plugged and coated with Elastin to avoid water damage.
infotexts.entitydescription.airmk1mod0round: A broken Mk1Mod0 Dart from shooting in the air.
infotexts.entitydescription.airp11round: A broken P11 Round from being shot in the air.
infotexts.entitydescription.airflechette: QBS Flechette round bent from being shot in the air.
infotexts.entitydescription.sppairflechette: Bent SPP Flechette Round from being shot in the air.
infotexts.entitydescription.sppwaterflechette: SPP Flechette Round, goes in the SPP.
infotexts.entitydescription.spp2magazine: It contains 8 rounds for the SPP-2 Underwater Pistol.
infotexts.entitydescription.mk1mod0magazine: It contains 6 sealed rounds for the Mk1Mod0 Underwater Defense Gun.
infotexts.entitydescription.p11magazine: It contains 5 sealed rounds for the P11.
infotexts.entitydescription.qbsmagazine: It contains 26 rounds for the QBS.
infotexts.entitydescription.ag026magazine: It contains 26 rounds for the AG-026.
infotexts.entitydescription.ag026magazine60: It contains 60 rounds for the AG-026.
infotexts.entitydescription.seawaybanger: A long stick with a contact explosive attached to the pointing end. Meant to deter sharks in melee range.
infotexts.entitydescription.seawaybanger_f: An electrical engineer used duct tape to stick a Flashlight onto the Bangstick.
infotexts.entitydescription.spp2: An old soviet design made by a mechanic to shoot 8 darts in 8 barrels.
infotexts.entitydescription.mk1mod0: An old design made by a mechanic to shoot 6 darts in a cylinder.
infotexts.entitydescription.p11: An old design made by an eletrical engineer to shoot 5 darts in a barrel.
infotexts.entitydescription.ag026_f: An electrical engineer used duct tape to stick a flashlight on the AG-026.
infotexts.entitydescription.ag026: A Russian prototype machine gun, it shoots darts and doesn't work well in air.
infotexts.entitydescription.qbs_f: An electrical engineer used duct tape to stick a flashlight on the QBS.
infotexts.entitydescription.qbs: A chinese variant of the Russian APS underwater assault rifle, it shoots darts and doesn't work well in air.
infotexts.entitydescription.ammopouch: A pouch made by a medic, containing 6 slots to store .50 cal ammo for the SeaWay Bangstick.
